thread.title: iBiz Software Inc.'s CardIntegra 2.0 and ShipIntegra 2.0 Achieve Oracle Validated Integration with Oracle Commerce 11.1
thread.title_full: iBiz Software Inc.'s CardIntegra 2.0 and ShipIntegra 2.0 Achieve Oracle Validated Integration with Oracle Commerce 11.1

author: admin
title: iBiz Software Inc.'s CardIntegra 2.0 and ShipIntegra 2.0 Achieve Oracle Validated Integration with Oracle Commerce 11.1
text:
iBiz Software Inc. 
FRISCO, Texas, Sept. 28, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- iBiz Software Inc. , a platinum-level member of Oracle Partner Network (OPN), today announced that it has achieved Oracle Validated Integration of CardIntegra v2.0 and ShipIntegra v2.0 with Oracle Commerce 11.1. 
Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150928/271560LOGO 
CardIntegra provides a dashboard to merchants and users to pick a bundled payment gateway such as Chase Paymentech, RBS WorldPay, PayPal, Litle-Vantiv and Evalon US Bank to implement a payment processing solution integrated with Oracle Commerce for enabling reduced costs, rapid deployment, ease of maintenance and support for multicurrency, multistore and multicard deployments. 
ShipIntegra provides a dashboard for merchants and users to pick any of the bundled freight carriers and supported shipping methods such as UPS and FedEx and implement eCommerce solutions with integrated shipping methods while enjoying the potential benefits of reduced costs, ease of maintenance and corporate account setups for freight carriers. 
To achieve Oracle Validated Integration, Oracle partners are required to meet a stringent set of requirements that are based on the needs and priorities of the customers. CardIntegra and ShipIntegra have been designed for a rapid e-commerce deployment. With a user-friendly dashboard, businesses can launch an eCommerce store that has integration points to various payment processors, freight carriers, and shipping methods. 
"Achieving Oracle Validated Integration gives Oracle Commerce customers confidence that the integration between either CardIntegra or ShipIntegra with Oracle Commerce 11.1 is functionally sound and performs as tested," said Kevin O'Brien, senior director, ISV and SaaS Strategy, at Oracle. "For solutions deployed on-premise, in the cloud, or both, Oracle Validated Integration applies a rigorous technical review and test process that helps to reduce deployment risk and improves the user experience of the partner's integrated offering." 
About iBizSoft 
Since 2001, iBizSoft has pioneered various integration solutions between Oracle applications and payment gateways. iBizSoft is a Platinum level member of Oracle PartnerNetwork (OPN), committed to delivering innovative Oracle solutions designed around your business requirements. iBizSoft specializes in Oracle Service Cloud and Oracle Commerce Cloud solutions. 
About Oracle Validated Integration 
Oracle Validated Integration, available through the Oracle PartnerNetwork (OPN), gives customers confidence that the integration of complementary partner software products with Oracle Applications and specific Oracle Fusion Middleware solutions have been validated, and the products work together as designed. This can help customers reduce risk, improve system implementation cycles, and provide for smoother upgrades and simpler maintenance. Oracle Validated Integration applies a rigorous technical process to review partner integrations. Partners who have successfully completed the program are authorized to use the "Oracle Validated Integration" logo. For more information, please visit Oracle.com at http://www.oracle.com/us/partnerships/solutions/index.html . 
About Oracle PartnerNetwork 
Oracle PartnerNetwork (OPN) Specialized is the latest version of Oracle's partner program that provides partners with tools to better develop, sell and implement Oracle solutions. OPN Specialized offers resources to train and support specialized knowledge of Oracle products and solutions and has evolved to recognize Oracle's growing product portfolio, partner base and business opportunity. Key to the latest enhancements to OPN is the ability for partners to differentiate through Specializations. Specializations are achieved through competency development, business results, expertise and proven success. To find out more visit http://www.oracle.com/partners .
